title: Pixel 4xl has battery issues since the newest security update. Meter will not read, showing a "?"
content: Sometimes the battery meter reappears on its own after leaving the phone alone. Restarting the phone at least 3 times sometimes works to restore the meter. It's quite frustrating as the device won't charge when the battery meter is not reading.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
